trans-unit.source: Text on Documents

seg-source.mrk: Text on Documents

trans-unit.source: Once the text has been assigned to the master data items, it can be used on the documents. In this section, the sales order is used to review text setup and the Order Confirmation report is used to preview the document text.

seg-source.mrk: Once the text has been assigned to the master data items, it can be used on the documents.
In this section, the sales order is used to review text setup and the Order Confirmation report is used to preview the document text.

trans-unit.source: Document Text Review

seg-source.mrk: Document Text Review

trans-unit.source: When a document, such as a sales order, is assigned to a customer that has been assigned text, a page appears to display the header text, the footer text, or both.

seg-source.mrk: When a document, such as a sales order, is assigned to a customer that has been assigned text, a page appears to display the header text, the footer text, or both.

trans-unit.source: : Customer-related header and footer Text Module notification on the sales order

seg-source.mrk: : Customer-related header and footer Text Module notification on the sales order

trans-unit.source: Click Close to close the Text Info page.

seg-source.mrk: Click Close to close the Text Info page.

trans-unit.source: The text relating to the customer can be accessed on the Sales Order by clicking Navigate > Header Texts or Footer Texts.

seg-source.mrk: The text relating to the customer can be accessed on the Sales Order by clicking Navigate > Header Texts or Footer Texts.

trans-unit.source: : Accessing customer-related text

seg-source.mrk: : Accessing customer-related text

trans-unit.source: To review the text, click Header Text or Footer Text on the ribbon to open the Edit Text page.

seg-source.mrk: To review the text, click Header Text or Footer Text on the ribbon to open the Edit Text page.

trans-unit.source: : Edit Text page for the customer header text

seg-source.mrk: : Edit Text page for the customer header text

trans-unit.source: In the Edit Text page, existing text can be viewed or edited, or new text can be added (refer to topic “Edit Text Page” on page 1 for more information).

seg-source.mrk: In the Edit Text page, existing text can be viewed or edited, or new text can be added (refer to topic “Edit Text Page” on page 1 for more information).

trans-unit.source: Notification pages also appear when items with text are added to a document.

seg-source.mrk: Notification pages also appear when items with text are added to a document.

trans-unit.source: : Item-related Text Module notification on the sales order

seg-source.mrk: : Item-related Text Module notification on the sales order

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Line Texts to access the assigned item-related text.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Line Texts to access the assigned item-related text.

trans-unit.source: : Accessing item-related text

seg-source.mrk: : Accessing item-related text

trans-unit.source: Similar to the customer text, the item text can be viewed and modified in the Edit Text page.

seg-source.mrk: Similar to the customer text, the item text can be viewed and modified in the Edit Text page.

trans-unit.source: : Edit Text page for the item text

seg-source.mrk: : Edit Text page for the item text

trans-unit.source: Edit Text Page

seg-source.mrk: Edit Text Page

trans-unit.source: As previously stated, the Edit Text page is used to view or modify existing text or to add new text. This page also includes the Print Code field, which is used to filter the lines by a Print Mgt. Code if multiple lines exist with different codes. The fields in the lines are the same as in the Lines FastTab on the Text Module Card (refer to topic “Lines FastTab” on page 1 for descriptions of these fields).

seg-source.mrk: As previously stated, the Edit Text page is used to view or modify existing text or to add new text.
This page also includes the Print Code field, which is used to filter the lines by a Print Mgt.
Code if multiple lines exist with different codes.
The fields in the lines are the same as in the Lines FastTab on the Text Module Card (refer to topic “Lines FastTab” on page 1 for descriptions of these fields).

trans-unit.source: : Actions on the Edit Text page

seg-source.mrk: : Actions on the Edit Text page

trans-unit.source: The Actions tab on the Edit Text page includes functions for copying and reverting changes to text. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The Actions tab on the Edit Text page includes functions for copying and reverting changes to text.
Each is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Action

seg-source.mrk: Action

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Copy Text

seg-source.mrk: Copy Text

trans-unit.source: Copies the text and all settings of the selected lines to the Clipboard.

seg-source.mrk: Copies the text and all settings of the selected lines to the Clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Paste Text Above

seg-source.mrk: Paste Text Above

trans-unit.source: Pastes the copied text from the Clipboard above the selected line.

seg-source.mrk: Pastes the copied text from the Clipboard above the selected line.

trans-unit.source: Paste Text Below

seg-source.mrk: Paste Text Below

trans-unit.source: Pastes the copied text from the Clipboard below the selected line.

seg-source.mrk: Pastes the copied text from the Clipboard below the selected line.

trans-unit.source: Paste Above

seg-source.mrk: Paste Above

trans-unit.source: Pastes standard text above the selected line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Standard Text_1.htm#_Ref416883731" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Standard Text” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Pastes standard text above the selected line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Standard Text_1.htm#_Ref416883731" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Standard Text” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Paste Below

seg-source.mrk: Paste Below

trans-unit.source: Pastes standard text below the selected line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Standard Text_1.htm#_Ref416883737" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Standard Text” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Pastes standard text below the selected line (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Standard Text_1.htm#_Ref416883737" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Standard Text” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Undo Changes

seg-source.mrk: Undo Changes

trans-unit.source: Reloads the text from the document and removes all changes made since opening the text.

seg-source.mrk: Reloads the text from the document and removes all changes made since opening the text.

trans-unit.source: For example, text has been assigned to a customer card. A user creates a sales order for this customer, opens the Edit Text page and accidentally deletes a line. Clicking Undo Changes will revert to the text that existed when the Edit Text page was opened.

seg-source.mrk: For example, text has been assigned to a customer card.
A user creates a sales order for this customer, opens the Edit Text page and accidentally deletes a line.
Clicking Undo Changes will revert to the text that existed when the Edit Text page was opened.

trans-unit.source: Exercise – Create Sales Order and Review Test on Order Confirmation

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Create Sales Order and Review Test on Order Confirmation

trans-unit.source: On January 24, 2019, Andy Teal from customer 10000, The Cannon Group PLC, places an order for one unit of item 1936-S.

seg-source.mrk: On January 24, 2019, Andy Teal from customer 10000, The Cannon Group PLC, places an order for one unit of item 1936-S.

trans-unit.source: Create the Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: Create the Sales Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the sales order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the sales order:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, under Sales & Marketing, click Order Processing > Sales Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, under Sales & Marketing, click Order Processing > Sales Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER or TAB.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER or TAB.

trans-unit.source: In the Sell-to Customer No. field, enter 10000.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sell-to Customer No.
field, enter 10000.

trans-unit.source: Press ENTER or TAB.

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER or TAB.

trans-unit.source: Review and then close the Text Info page that displays the customer header/footer text.

seg-source.mrk: Review and then close the Text Info page that displays the customer header/footer text.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, enter Item in the Type field.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, enter Item in the Type field.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field enter 1936-S and then press ENTER.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field enter 1936-S and then press ENTER.

trans-unit.source: Review and then close the Text Info page that displays the item text.

seg-source.mrk: Review and then close the Text Info page that displays the item text.

trans-unit.source: In the Location Code field, enter BLUE.

seg-source.mrk: In the Location Code field, enter BLUE.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity field, type 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity field, type 1.

trans-unit.source: Report Text Review

seg-source.mrk: Report Text Review

trans-unit.source: Once the report is ready, it can be printed or previewed with the assigned text.

seg-source.mrk: Once the report is ready, it can be printed or previewed with the assigned text.

trans-unit.source: Exercise – Review Text on the Order Confirmation

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Review Text on the Order Confirmation

trans-unit.source: Andy Teal receives an order confirmation when he places an order. Preview the Order Confirmation and confirm the text is printed correctly.

seg-source.mrk: Andy Teal receives an order confirmation when he places an order.
Preview the Order Confirmation and confirm the text is printed correctly.

trans-unit.source: Preview the Order Confirmation

seg-source.mrk: Preview the Order Confirmation

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to preview the Order Confirmation:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to preview the Order Confirmation:

trans-unit.source: On the Sales Order, click Home > Print Confirmation.

seg-source.mrk: On the Sales Order, click Home > Print Confirmation.

trans-unit.source: Click Preview.

seg-source.mrk: Click Preview.

trans-unit.source: : Order Confirmation with customer and item text

seg-source.mrk: : Order Confirmation with customer and item text

trans-unit.source:
Note the following:
  • Above the item information, the greeting to Mr. Teal appears (bolded and underlined).
  • Under the item description, the item text appears (bolded and red; italicized, bolded, underlined and black).
  • Under the VAT information, the closing to Mr. Teal appears (italicized and blue).

seg-source.mrk: Note the following:
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Above the item information, the greeting to Mr. Teal appears (bolded and underlined).
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Under the item description, the item text appears (bolded and red; italicized, bolded, underlined and black).
• Under the VAT information, the closing to Mr. Teal appears (italicized and blue).

trans-unit.source: Close the Print Preview page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Print Preview page.

trans-unit.source: Adjust Text Settings

seg-source.mrk: Adjust Text Settings

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to remove the item text from the document:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to remove the item text from the document:

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Line Texts.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Line Texts.

trans-unit.source: Clear the Print Mgt. Code field on both lines.

seg-source.mrk: Clear the <span class="Bold">Print Mgt.
Code field on both lines.

trans-unit.source: : Removal of print management code for item text on the Order Confirmation

seg-source.mrk: : Removal of print management code for item text on the Order Confirmation

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Edit Text page and then escape back to the Sales Order.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Edit Text page and then escape back to the Sales Order.

trans-unit.source: On the Sales Order ribbon, click Print Confirmation.

seg-source.mrk: On the Sales Order ribbon, click Print Confirmation.

trans-unit.source: Click Preview.

seg-source.mrk: Click Preview.

trans-unit.source: Note that the customer-related header/footer text is displayed, but the item text is not.

seg-source.mrk: Note that the customer-related header/footer text is displayed, but the item text is not.

trans-unit.source: : Order Confirmation with customer text only

seg-source.mrk: : Order Confirmation with customer text only

trans-unit.source: Close the Print Preview page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Print Preview page.

trans-unit.source: Reactivate the item-related text on the Order Processing report and then preview to confirm that it is displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Reactivate the item-related text on the Order Processing report and then preview to confirm that it is displayed.
